description: "This map uses coloured borders to show the ancient kingdoms of Southeast Asia. A label on the island of Borneo states ‘Beajous Idolatres habitans le milieu de l'Isle [Beajous idolaters inhabit the middle of the Island]’."
title: "Carte des Indes et de la Chine...par Guillaume de l'Isle. [in] Atlas Nouveau [cartographic material]."
